titles.title: Save Our Small and Seasonal Businesses Act of 2011
To prioritize certain returning workers for purposes of the numerical limitation on H-2B temporary workers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

bill.summary: 12/16/2011--Introduced. Save Our Small and Seasonal Businesses Act of 2011 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt certain returning H-2B aliens (temporary nonagricultural worker) from annual numerical limitations.
